name: Scrambled: A Game Jam War
description:
Disclaimer: This game was made for fun and I do not mean to offend anyone.

This game is supposed to be funny and meme-ish while also pretty puzzling.

Get the MashUp Game Jam to the Goal which is The #1 Spot on Itch.io while avoiding GMTK Jam. However, each letter is to be controlled individually.

As per the theme of this Jam, this game fulfills it in a few ways.

1. The world is letter based, for example the ground is made of #.

2. The "Player"(S) are letters, is the MashUp Jam itself and the enemy or defeat objects are the GMTK Game Jam.

3. Absolutely messed up controls (but leads to some decent puzzles).

Don't worry it will make sense when you play the game. Oh and the game was made in under 24 hours because I thrive off of self-imposed stress :D
